snippet: American consumers borrowed more in November to buy cars and attend school, but they stayed cautious about using their credit cards.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that American consumers borrowed more in November to purchase cars and attend school, but remained cautious about using their credit cards.
lead_paragraph: American consumers borrowed more in November to buy cars and attend school, but they stayed cautious about using their credit cards.

headline.main: Consumer Debt Rises on Cars and Education
headline.print_headline: Consumer Debt Rises on Cars And Education
